=API for with-ns=
Usage: 
{{{
(ns <your-namespace>
  (:use clojure.contrib.with-ns))
}}}


==Public Variables and Functions==
Shortcuts:
[#(_with-ns_ns_&_body) with-ns] [#(_with-temp-ns_&_body) with-temp-ns] 

----
===(`_`with-ns`_` ns & body)===
====Macro====
<pre> Evaluates body in another namespace.  ns is either a namespace
object or a symbol.  This makes it possible to define functions in
namespaces other than the current one.</pre>
----
===(`_`with-temp-ns`_` & body)===
====Macro====
<pre> Evaluates body in an anonymous namespace, which is then immediately
removed.  The temporary namespace will 'refer' clojure.core.</pre>
